item.title: VR Test
item.author: joe.v.iacoviello@gmail.com (Joseph Iacoviello)
item.description: Screenshots Goal The goal of this app is as a demonstration of my ability to write android native code that interfaces with OpenGL Completed tasks Here’s the list of what I completed: The app relies on the module vr_mod_1. The app uses RelativeLayout and several other UI elements to implement a YouTube like UI. The UI adjusts itself for both screen size and orientation.
